name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior ML Engineer with over 10 years of experience in machine learning (ML) applications, specializing in speech synthesis and text-to-speech (TTS) technologies. Proficient in leveraging **Python**, **PyTorch**, and orchestration tools such as **Kubernetes** and **Docker** to develop and deploy high-performance ML models. Skilled in utilizing frameworks like **Kubeflow**, **MLflow**, and **Weights & Biases** for streamlined ML workflows. Experienced in managing data with **PostgreSQL**, **Kafka**, and **Redis**, and optimizing ML inference through **ONNX** and **TensorRT**. Proven track record of delivering innovative solutions at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, with a focus on scalable cloud-native architectures.
